description.en:
If your hair is oily, you have dandruff, or you're suffering from hair loss, MixOil Rosemary & Almond is the perfect product for you ğŸŒ¿

This is a special blend of Rosemary oil + Almond oil, where each oil plays a complementary role:

Rosemary oil helps stimulate blood circulation in the scalp, strengthens hair follicles, reduces hair loss, and regulates oil production - making it an excellent choice for oily hair. It also helps reduce dandruff and purify the scalp with continued use ğŸŒ¿

Almond oil deeply nourishes and moisturizes hair without weighing it down. It helps reduce dryness and breakage, leaving hair softer, shinier, and healthier ğŸ¥œ

With consistent use, you'll notice a clear difference in your hair's strength and health. Your shine will return, and you'll gradually eliminate hair loss, excess oil, and dandruff ğŸ˜

Most importantly? We're with you every step of the way ğŸ’›
We'll keep checking on your results and your hair's progress. If you need help with application or your daily routine, message us anytime or contact customer service.

If your hair is dry, damaged, or breaking easily, MixOil Castor is exactly what you need ğŸŒ°âœ¨

A gentle, safe shampoo specially formulated for curly hair! ğŸŒ¿âœ¨

This shampoo is enriched with lightweight oils like argan oil and macadamia oil that won't build up on your hair. It cleanses your curls thoroughly without stripping away the natural oils that protect against dryness or damaging your scalp.

The gentle formula respects your curls' natural moisture balance while removing dirt and buildup. Perfect for daily or regular use, it leaves your hair clean, fresh, and ready for conditioning and styling.

Ideal for curly, wavy, and coily hair types that need gentle cleansing without harsh sulfates. Your curls will feel light, bouncy, and full of life!

description.en:
If your hair is curly, coarse, damaged, African-textured, or extremely dry, Africa Shea Butter is the perfect product for you ğŸ§ˆ

This is concentrated, intensive shea butter specifically designed to meet the needs of hair that requires very deep moisture and powerful nourishment.

The intensive shea butter deeply moisturizes hair from the first use, seals the hair shaft and locks in moisture for extended periods, making it ideal for thick African hair. It also helps reduce frizz and detangle stubborn knots.

This product is excellent for hair damaged by heat, coloring, or straightening treatments. It helps restore hair's elasticity and strength, reducing breakage and split ends with continued use. It's perfect for extremely dry hair that doesn't respond well to lightweight oils alone.

With consistent use, you'll notice a clear difference in your hair's softness, moisture, fragrance, and shine.

Most importantly? We're with you every step of the way ğŸ’›
We'll keep checking on your results and your hair's progress. If you need help with application or your daily routine, message us anytime or contact customer service.
